alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Hand; Hyde; Potter; Sully; Walworth (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 25 at 1:36PM MST until December 25 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches and ice accumulations of up to three tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central and north central South Dakota. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, until midnight CST tonight. For the Winter Storm Warning, from midnight tonight to 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Campbell; Hand; Hyde; Potter; Sully; Walworth
